description: Ultimately from Arabic مُفْتِي‎ (muftī, “fatwa-deliverer”, literally “deliverer of formal opinion”).

entries.meaning: (countable, Islam) A Muslim scholar and interpreter of shari’a law, who can deliver a fatwa.
(uncountable, Australia, Britain, New Zealand) A civilian dress when worn by a member of the military, or casual dress when worn by a pupil of a school who normally would wear uniform.
